last_episode_to_air.name: A Hard Way to Go
last_episode_to_air.overview: Every desperate deal. Every broken promise. Every bloody murder. Eager to leave their murky past behind, the Byrdes make a final bid for freedom.

name: Ozark
overview: A financial adviser drags his family from Chicago to the Missouri Ozarks, where he must launder $500 million in five years to appease a drug boss.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Marty's plan to open a riverboat casino is complicated by Darlene Snell's schemes, Ruth's paroled father, state politics and a Kansas City mobster.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Business as usual? No such thing. As Marty and Wendy clash over whether or not to expand, a surprise visitor turns their personal lives upside down.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Freedom from the cartel is seemingly within reach, but fraying familial bonds may prove to be the Byrdes' ultimate undoing.

episodes.name: Sugarwood
episodes.overview: After his business partner cheats a dangerous client, financial adviser Marty must devise a radical plan to save the lives of himself and his family.

episodes.name: Blue Cat
episodes.overview: In the Ozarks, Marty struggles to find a local business he can use for money laundering, while his kids make new friends but neglect a crucial duty.

episodes.name: My Dripping Sleep
episodes.overview: Marty finds a way to control Ruth. Wendy worms her way into a job. Looking for another business to invest in, Marty digs for info on the strip bar.

episodes.name: Tonight We Improvise
episodes.overview: Marty hires Ruth to pull off a heist. Agent Petty forges a relationship with a member of the Langmore family. Jonah exhibits disturbing behavior.

episodes.name: Ruling Days
episodes.overview: Marty decides to invest in the religious sector, unaware he will disrupt a discreet business operation. A surprise visitor shows up at the Byrde home.

episodes.name: Book of Ruth
episodes.overview: Jacob educates Marty on his business. Ruth devises and sets in motion a deadly plan. Rachel learns Marty is cooking the books at the Blue Cat Lodge.

episodes.name: Nest Box
episodes.overview: To stop Jacob from carrying out his threat, Marty makes an offer. Agent Petty gets what he needs to turn Russ. Charlotte grows desperate to escape.

episodes.name: Kaleidoscope
episodes.overview: In a flashback to 10 years prior, Wendy struggles with depression, Del asks Marty to be his financial adviser, and Agent Petty faces a family crisis.

episodes.name: Coffee, Black
episodes.overview: Russ learns Agent Petty's true identity and makes plans to murder, steal and flee. Wendy stumbles on an ideal business to add to the Byrde portfolio.

episodes.name: The Toll
episodes.overview: During his next sermon, Mason falters. Wendy and the kids are caught trying to flee their home. Marty brokers a deal between Jacob and Del.

episodes.name: Reparations
episodes.overview: Ruth's dad gets out of jail. Approval for a riverboat casino calls for Wendy's political skills. The Mexican cartel demands reparations from the Snells.

episodes.name: The Precious Blood of Jesus
episodes.overview: When a mobster jeopardizes the casino bill, Marty enlists Buddy's help. Wendy resorts to dirty tactics to get votes. Cade reminds Ruth of her roots.

episodes.name: Once a Langmore...
episodes.overview: Wendy does damage control when Wilkes's pressure on Sen. Blake backfires. Rachel is sent on a mission. Ruth resists accepting her Langmore destiny.

episodes.name: Stag
episodes.overview: The FBI sends out a second lure. Charlotte slips up while chatting with Wyatt. The Byrdes grow wary of Rachel, who deflects suspicion onto someone else.

episodes.name: Game Day
episodes.overview: Agent Petty's revelation tests the loyalties of Marty, Ruth and the cartel. Despite the FBI closing in, the Snells refuse to destroy their poppies.

episodes.name: Outer Darkness
episodes.overview: An FBI search of the Snells' field yields a surprise. Playing hardball, Agent Petty questions Wilkes. The Byrdes mourn a loss.

episodes.name: One Way Out
episodes.overview: Mason goes off the deep end and focuses his rage on the Byrdes. Ruth tries to make her dad proud during a boat-part heist.

episodes.name: The Big Sleep
episodes.overview: Darlene makes one too many rash moves. Marty tries to free Rachel from Agent Petty's grasp. Jonah helps his mom force Wilkes to continue his support.

episodes.name: The Badger
episodes.overview: Marty finds a way around the Snells. Charlotte hires a lawyer. The Byrdes get a meeting with the gaming commission, whose approval comes with a big ask.

episodes.name: The Gold Coast
episodes.overview: Marty makes plans without telling Wendy. Darlene sends a message via Jonah. Wyatt learns the truth about his dad. Ruth realizes Cade must be stopped.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Marty's plan to open a riverboat casino is complicated by Darlene Snell's schemes, Ruth's paroled father, state politics and a Kansas City mobster.

episodes.name: Wartime
episodes.overview: Marty is pressured to move money ahead of schedule, Wendy pitches a high-stakes plan, Wyatt lives the good life, and Ruth butts heads in the casino.

episodes.name: Civil Union
episodes.overview: Wendy asks Helen - not Marty - to help close a deal, the Byrdes get a new houseguest, and business goes boom aboard a rival casino.

episodes.name: Kevin Cronin Was Here
episodes.overview: The FBI dives into the casino's finances, Wendy's dreams take a dark turn, and Marty worries that the writing may be on the wall.

episodes.name: Boss Fight
episodes.overview: As Wendy, Helen and Ruth strive to keep the business humming, Navarro plays mind games with Marty, who worries he'll never see his family again.

episodes.name: It Came From Michoacán
episodes.overview: Maya steps up her bid to turn Marty, whose eerily calm demeanor has Wendy worried. The Byrdes buy a horse farm on behalf of Navarro.

episodes.name: Su Casa Es Mi Casa
episodes.overview: Marty and Wendy tell each other how they really feel, Ruth confronts Wyatt, Darlene lets her ambitions be known, and Ben's past comes into focus.

episodes.name: In Case of Emergency
episodes.overview: The FBI questions Ruth, tensions between Cosgrove and Marty hit a new high, Sue takes on a new patient, and Wendy recruits for her foundation.

episodes.name: BFF
episodes.overview: Ruth isn't happy about Marty and Wendy's plan to bury the hatchet with Frank Jr. The Byrdes make a difficult decision about Ben. Maya is reprimanded.

episodes.name: Fire Pink
episodes.overview: Ben's confrontation with Helen and Erin sends the Byrdes into crisis mode. Meanwhile, Sam's concerns about the FBI inspire little sympathy.

episodes.name: All In
episodes.overview: While Wendy battles personal demons, Marty struggles to keep their lives from falling apart. Darlene does Ruth a favor.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Business as usual? No such thing. As Marty and Wendy clash over whether or not to expand, a surprise visitor turns their personal lives upside down.

episodes.name: The Beginning of the End
episodes.overview: Marty and Wendy wrestle with a problematic offer. Ruth goes out on her own, Jonah rebels, and Omar's nephew makes his presence known.

episodes.name: Let The Great World Spin
episodes.overview: Maya pushes back on Marty's plan for Omar. Ruth pursues the hipster heroin market. Wendy tries to raise $150 million. The new sheriff causes problems.

episodes.name: City on the Make
episodes.overview: Maya and Omar meet face-to-face. Wendy has a contentious business meeting. Ruth goes behind Darlene's back. Jonah finds a new place to set up shop.

episodes.name: Ace Deuce
episodes.overview: Wendy's claims about Ben anger Ruth. Mel the P.I. tracks down Wendy's father. Ruth's trip to the Missouri Belle with Kerry doesn't go as planned.

episodes.name: Ellie
episodes.overview: The Senator extends an olive branch — with a twist. Ruth and Marty scramble to rebuy the drugs Darlene sold. Charlotte ponders life after high school.

episodes.name: Sangre Sobre Todo
episodes.overview: Marty is tasked with proving Omar wasn't involved with a bombing. Wendy pays a visit to the Lazy-O Motel. Ruth and Wyatt make a plan.

episodes.name: Sanctified
episodes.overview: The FBI's long-awaited meeting with Omar takes place. Wyatt shares some news with Ruth. Feeling betrayed, Javi gets aggressive.

episodes.name: The Cousin of Death
episodes.overview: Devastated by a tremendous loss, Ruth heads to Chicago to enact revenge as Marty tries to talk her out of doing something she may regret.

episodes.name: Pick a God and Pray
episodes.overview: Their deal with the FBI now dead, the Byrdes desperately search for more solutions to their growing problems. Wendy’s father comes to town.

episodes.name: You're the Boss
episodes.overview: Marty travels to the Navarro estate, Ruth asks Frank Jr. for a favor, a new acting sheriff makes waves, and Wendy tries to bring Jim back into the fold.

episodes.name: Pound of Flesh and Still Kickin'
episodes.overview: Ruth makes a play for the casino with some help from a familiar face. Wendy cozies up to Omar's sister and arranges a meeting with Clare.

episodes.name: Trouble The Water
episodes.overview: Nathan angers Wendy by making Charlotte and Jonah a surprising offer. Ruth tries to erase her own past with an assist from Charles Wilkes.

episodes.name: Mud
episodes.overview: Omar pressures Marty to launder more money, but Ruth wants to keep her casino clean. Wendy goes to extremes to keep her children.

episodes.name: A Hard Way to Go
episodes.overview: Every desperate deal. Every broken promise. Every bloody murder. Eager to leave their murky past behind, the Byrdes make a final bid for freedom.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Freedom from the cartel is seemingly within reach, but fraying familial bonds may prove to be the Byrdes' ultimate undoing.
